short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inject an APN sidebar on the current tab when the page action is clicked

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The APN Chrome Extension works with your APN PublisherID so you can easily promote a specific SHOP.COM product on a site or blog.  Use your Chrome browser to navigate through SHOP.COM and find the exact product you want to promote.  Then open the APN Chrome Extension to get a snippet of HTML code you can copy and paste into any HTML editor.  Choose between showing the product image, text, or both.  The APN Chrome Extension makes sure your PublisherID gets credit for new customers sent to SHOP.COM!
